sdata.j: ↑議論↑↓ぎろん↓のため、↑母親↑↓ははおや↓と↑息子↑↓むすこ↓の↑近親↑↓|きんしん|↓↑相姦↑↓そうかん↓が↑黙認↑↓もくにん↓されている↑部族↑↓ぶぞく↓↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓を↑仮定↑↓かてい↓してみよう。
sdata.e: Imagine, for the sake of argument, a tribal group in which mother-son incest was countenanced.

sdata.j: ↑選手↑↓せんしゅ↓↑達↑↓たち↓の↑平均↑↓へい|きん↓↑身長↑↓しん|ちょう↓はどのくらいですか。

sdata.e: The average height of the girls in class is over 155 centimeters.

sdata.e: I read in the newspaper recently that the crops really need rain.

sdata.e: Incest is a taboo found in almost all cultures.

sdata.e: I haven't read the paper lately, so I don't know who we're electing this year.
